Updated Information and Family Resources
During the "Stay Home, Stay Safe" Order

h4.em:
ALL district buildings and ALL outside areas, including the tennis courts, baseball and softball fields, and the track area will be closed until the order has expired.
This page will be updated regularly as new information becomes available.

em.span: Learners of all ages will develop the skills and habits they need to build emotionally and physically healthy lives while growing into caring, responsible adults.

strong.span: ds for Applauding People who Provide service at a Level of Excellence! This program provides parents, school employees, students, volunteers or visitors with an opportunity to recognize any Goodrich staff member who exemplifies Educational Excellence and/or Extraordinary Service to our school community.

img.style: width: 400px; height: 114px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle;
img.longdesc: Be sure to respond by April 1, 2020!

div.style: padding: 2%; text-align: center; color: white; background-color: rgb(31, 73, 125);

div.div:
The Bond 2020 School Bond Millage vote has been postponed until August 4, 2020 due to concerns about the health risks of our community members and election workers associated with the Covid-19 virus. More details will follow. (3/19/2020)
Click for Bond 2020 Proposal Information
